item.title: #2 In Loving Memory Of The Always Fabulous Para Pubicist Donn Shy- Message About Life
item.description: It was an honor and a privilege to have Donn Shy as a ParaChallenged Radio friend, family member, and contributor since 2008. Talking with her was always a pleasure, and she is greatly missed. We are making her show segments from 2010 through her tribute show available to keep her message, and her memory alive. Please enjoy. Donn was one of a kind, a true joy who will never be forgotten. (You've Got A Friend In Me!!)*This Episode is a perfect example of why we adored Donn so much!!*

item.title: ParaChallenged Radio Welcomes David Rountree!!
item.description: Not only an AWESOME interview but David Rountree is the Director of Scientific Paranormal Investigative Research Information and Technology, a paranormal research Laboratory dedicated to the design build of detection and data recording of environmental aspects of paranormal Phenomena, and Co-Director of the New Jersey Paranormal Research Group, and investigative organization which performs investigations and field experimentation.

item.title: ParaChallenged Radio Welcomes Christopher Quaratino (Lutz) -Amityville Horror
item.description: At the age of 7, Christopher Quaratino fka Lutz, lived in the Amityville Horror house with his family- George & Kathy Lutz, for 28 days- a year after the gruesome murders of the Defaeo family in 1974.

item.title: ParaChallenged Radio Welcomes Friday the 13th's Kane Hodder!!
item.description: HUGE Thanks To Kane Hodder For Being Such A FABULOUS & Gracious Guest Tuesday Night On ParaChallenged Radio!! From playing Jason Voorhees in four of the Friday the 13th films (7,8,9,10) to his latest role as Victor Crowley in the Hatchet series, Kane Hodder has been killing people on film for decades. Hodder, a professional stuntman, stunt coordinator and actor has appeared in over a hundred films and television shows in his thirty year career. CHECK IT OUT!! OCTOBER 1ST get your copy of Unmasked- The True Life Story of the World’s Most Prolific Cinematic Killer!! For the first time, Kane tells his life story, from growing up on a tiny island to the truth behind his life altering burn and untold stories from the sets of his classic films. I will be ordering my copy!! www.KaneHodderKills.com Then Brian and Kathy shared some laughs with the awesome NIGHTWATCH Crew!! You can tune into Nightwatch Live on Tuesday Nights at 9pm Central/10pm Eastern on www.JackalopeRadio.com!!

item.title: ParaChallenged Radio Welcomes Brian Cano Of Syfy Channel's- Haunted Collector!!!
item.description: Brian and I had a BLAST talking with Brian Cano!! As one of the founding members of SCARED!TM Brian started out as the Skeptic. As the show progressed, he became increasingly more receptive of the paranormal. He has taken courses in Astrology, Parapsychology and is certified as an EVP-ITC Technician and Paranormal Investigator. As the resident Parapsychologist he now approaches all investigations with an open mind and is readily willing to accept the truth, no matter where it lies. Brian is the "tech" specialist on Haunted Collecter,he is responsible for the implementation and use of all of the tech equipment. Fascinated by the paranormal since he was 10 years old, Brian is a scientist who's mission is to quantify, measure and get empirical evidence for the phenomena that they are investigating.
